cards.name: Acro Bike
cards.effect: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck and put 1 of them into your hand. Discard the other card.

cards.name: Apricorn Maker
cards.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Item cards that have the word "Ball" in their name, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Beast Ball
cards.effect: Look at your face-down Prize cards. You may reveal an Ultra Beast card you find there, put it into your hand, and put this Beast Ball in its place. (If you don’t reveal an Ultra Beast card, put this card in the discard pile.) Then, shuffle your face-down Prize cards.

cards.name: Bill’s Maintenance
cards.effect: Shuffle a card from your hand into your deck. If you do, draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Copycat
cards.effect: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw a card for each card in your opponent’s hand.

cards.name: Energy Recycle System
cards.effect:
Choose 1:

•Put a basic Energy card from your discard pile into your hand.
•Shuffle 3 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Energy Switch
cards.effect: Move a basic Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

cards.name: Fisherman
cards.effect: Put 4 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Friend Ball
cards.effect: Search your deck for a Pokémon with the same type as 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon in play, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Hau
cards.effect: Draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Hiker
cards.effect: Look at the top 5 cards of either player’s deck and choose 1 of them. That player shuffles the other cards back into their deck. Then, put the card you chose on top of that deck.

cards.name: Hustle Belt
cards.effect: If the Pokémon this card is attached to has 30 HP or less remaining and has any damage counters on it, its attacks do 60 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Last Chance Potion
cards.effect: Heal 120 damage from 1 of your Pokémon that has 30 HP or less remaining.

cards.name: Life Herb
cards.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, heal 60 damage and remove all Special Conditions from 1 of your Pokémon.

cards.name: Lisia
cards.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 ◇ (Prism Star) cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Lure Ball
cards.effect: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, put an Evolution Pokémon from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: The Masked Royal
cards.effect: Attach a basic Energy card from your hand to one of your Stage 2 Grass, Fire, or Water Pokémon.

cards.name: PokéNav
cards.effect: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Pokémon or Energy card you find there and put it into your hand. Put the other cards back in any order.

cards.name: Rainbow Brush
cards.effect: Choose an Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokémon. Search your deck for a basic Energy card and switch it with that card. Shuffle the first Energy card into your deck.

cards.name: Rare Candy
cards.effect: Choose 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. If you have a Stage 2 card in your hand that evolves from that Pokémon, put that card onto the Basic Pokémon to evolve it. You can’t use this card during your first turn or on a Basic Pokémon that was put into play this turn.

cards.name: Shrine of Punishment
cards.effect: Between turns, put 1 damage counter on each Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX (both yours and your opponent’s).

cards.name: Sky Pillar
cards.effect: Prevent all effects of the opponent’s attacks, including damage, done to Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent’s).

cards.name: Steven’s Resolve
cards.effect: Search your deck for up to 3 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. Your turn ends.

cards.name: Super Scoop Up
cards.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 of your Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your hand.

cards.name: Switch
cards.effect: Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

cards.name: Tate & Liza
cards.effect:
Choose 1:

•Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 5 cards.
•Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

cards.name: TV Reporter
cards.effect: Draw 3 cards. Then, discard a card from your hand. If you have no cards in your deck, you can’t play this card.

cards.name: Underground Expedition
cards.effect: Look at the bottom 4 cards of your deck and put 2 of them into your hand. Put the other cards back on the bottom of your deck in any order.

attacks.name: Perplex
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Extrasensory
attacks.effect: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 90 more damage.

attacks.name: Den of Iniquity GX
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. Your opponent shuffles that Pokémon and all cards attached to it into their deck. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Explosive Kick
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Fire Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Blaze Out GX
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy from your opponent’s Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Legendary Ascent
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may switch it with your Active Pokémon. If you do, move any number of Water Energy from your other Pokémon to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Cold Crush GX
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from both Active Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Extra Energy Bomb
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach 5 Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokémon, except Pokémon-GX or Pokémon-EX, in any way you like. If you do, this Pokémon is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Crush and Burn GX
attacks.effect: Discard any amount of Energy from your Pokémon. This attack does 50 more damage for each card you discarded in this way. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Magic Evens
abilities.effect: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by your opponent’s attacks if that damage is exactly 20, 40, 60, 80, 100, 120, 140, 160, 180, 200, 220, 240, or 260.

attacks.name: Breakdown
attacks.effect: For each card in your opponent’s hand, put 1 damage counter on their Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Life Trick GX
attacks.effect: Heal all damage from this Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Shady Move
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, you may move 1 damage counter from 1 Pokémon to another Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shadow Chant
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 more damage for each Supporter card in your discard pile. You can’t add more than 100 damage in this way.

attacks.name: Tomb Hunt GX
attacks.effect: Put 3 cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Danger Perception
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon’s remaining HP is 100 or less, its attacks do 80 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Steel Wing
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Cross-Cut GX
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, this attack does 100 more damage. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Ultra Wall
abilities.effect: Your Ultra Beasts take 10 less damage from your opponent’s attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Assembly GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 more damage for each Prize card you have taken. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Stormy Winds
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may discard the top 3 cards of your deck. If you do, attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dragon Break
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage times the amount of basic Grass and basic Lightning Energy attached to your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tempest GX
attacks.effect: Discard your hand and draw 10 cards. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Apricorn Maker
cards.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Item cards that have the word "Ball" in their name, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Bill’s Maintenance
cards.effect: Shuffle a card from your hand into your deck. If you do, draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Copycat
cards.effect: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw a card for each card in your opponent’s hand.

cards.name: Lisia
cards.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 ◇ (Prism Star) cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Steven’s Resolve
cards.effect: Search your deck for up to 3 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. Your turn ends.

cards.name: Tate & Liza
cards.effect:
Choose 1:

•Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 5 cards.
•Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dragon Break
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage times the amount of basic Grass and basic Lightning Energy attached to your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tempest GX
attacks.effect: Discard your hand and draw 10 cards. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Acro Bike
cards.effect: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck and put 1 of them into your hand. Discard the other card.

cards.name: Hustle Belt
cards.effect: If the Pokémon this card is attached to has 30 HP or less remaining and has any damage counters on it, its attacks do 60 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Life Herb
cards.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, heal 60 damage and remove all Special Conditions from 1 of your Pokémon.

cards.name: PokéNav
cards.effect: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Pokémon or Energy card you find there and put it into your hand. Put the other cards back in any order.

cards.name: Rainbow Brush
cards.effect: Choose an Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokémon. Search your deck for a basic Energy card and switch it with that card. Shuffle the first Energy card into your deck.
